extendedInfo.description: EZ Sudoku is a free and intuitive Sudoku game with thousands puzzles! The only Sudoku that can explain you how to solve your puzzle!Every gamer will enjoy the 4 difficulty levels (from easy to expert). EZ Sudoku offers all required features: notes (multiple values in the same cell), unlimited undo and redoâ¦ Should you need to stop the game, the Sudoku puzzle will be automatically saved and resumed whenever you're ready to play again. Helpers are available to bring support if you wish.Unique feature: if you can't solve the puzzle and on your demand only, EZ Sudoku will explain step by step how to find the next digit. Many solving techniques have been implemented, like sole candidate,X-Wing, XY-Wing, Simple coloring... - 4 difficulty levels (from easy to expert) - Auto save - Undo and redo - Notes - Annotate all empty cases - Optional helpers - And so onPlease do not hesitate to contact us with any improvement ideas you may have!This game is also known as number place, su doku or soudokou.

reviews.title: Confusing
reviews.comment: Using help button should only solve the puzzle based on the updated annotations. The problem with the existing one is that although I have already edited the annotations to reduce possible candidates, when I press help me, calculations includes again  candidates I already removed from the annotations. It is confusing.
reviews.author: Jeric Sayoc

reviews.title: Great version
reviews.comment: I have played many different suduko games. This has a great interface and features.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Easy but terribly effective
reviews.comment: Nice and simple to use, a must have! The help feature is simply awesome
reviews.author: Didier CHEVRERE

reviews.title: Great application
reviews.comment: Great application. I love the solving methods to improve our resolution technics.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app. Exactly what I need when commuting
reviews.comment: Works as expected with hints, error fix, highlights.  Nice for beginners to crazy rocket experts. Suggestion : add haptic feedback when typing
reviews.author: A Google User
